19cc4e42-39bb-41f9-b9de-9f2940eed6a2.overall_goal: Retrieve and organize cleaning tools (mop and cloth) and perform cleaning-related actions around the car and nearby surfaces.

episodes.name: Gather & Clean Area
episodes.description: The person picks up a mop, sweeps the floor (including in/around the car), manipulates a door, places the mop back on the floor, and puts a cloth inside the car.

episodes.name: Retrieve Supplies
episodes.description: The person moves to a cabinet, opens it, picks up a cloth, moves to the wall area while holding the cloth, and picks a mop from the wall.

fbf4150a-27d2-48a4-956f-b4f85ecde465.overall_goal: Set up and interact with a laptop and its peripherals (connect charger, place keyboard and mouse, and use keys/mouse).

episodes.name: Set Up Laptop
episodes.description: The person manipulates the laptop and peripherals: presses keys, closes/unplugs/puts away and then reopens/places the laptop, inserts the charger and plug into the laptop and socket, places the keyboard and mouse on the table, and then uses the mouse and keys.

954c2f61-64ad-4c89-a26f-ec4547a65fab.overall_goal: Prepare and begin cooking an onion by washing, cutting, placing into a pot, filling the pot, and turning on the cooker.

episodes.name: Onion prep & cooking
episodes.description: The person washes and prepares the onion (washing, slicing, peeling), prepares and fills the pot, places the pot on the cooker, and turns on the cooker to start cooking.

277b18de-4ad9-4c09-970b-91fcea05097d.overall_goal: Perform tool handling and basic maintenance: organize and store tools, tighten fasteners, and remove/adjust a wheel.

episodes.name: Gather Tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and places several tools (wrench, plier, spanner) to gather or arrange them.

e9be1118-a5cf-4431-b2e8-e3edcfa9f949.overall_goal: Assemble and fasten wooden parts by positioning, clamping, drilling, and screwing pieces together using hand tools.

episodes.name: Prepare & Drill Assembly
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and parts, positions and clamps wood pieces, drills holes, and performs intermediary fastening and placement steps.

episodes.name: Final Screw Positioning
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and screw and positions the screw on the wood-piece for final fastening.

f5c27b88-a3eb-4290-9102-0307c2809241.overall_goal: Rearrange, inspect, and clean books and the bookshelf (move books between shelf and floor, inspect them, and remove dust).

episodes.name: Arrange books
episodes.description: The person arranges and places a book, moving it between floor and bookshelf and aligning it on the shelf.

97ad4e58-c64f-47e3-8d84-6aad38bdfbc8.overall_goal: Install and secure bolts onto a machine by positioning the bolts and fastening them (using a hammer for initial actions and a screwdriver for tightening).

episodes.name: Prepare & Position Bolt
episodes.description: The person picks up a hammer, uses it while holding the machine, then picks up and positions a bolt on the machine and readies a screwdriver, culminating in tightening and releasing the bolt.

episodes.name: Fasten Bolt
episodes.description: The person places the screwdriver aside, repeatedly picks up and positions the bolt on the machine, and uses the screwdriver to hold and tighten the bolt, then releases it.

a20c2c22-cc2c-487e-8041-f0b33f4845ca.overall_goal: Prepare and attach fabric to furniture by cutting, gluing, and nailing, then trim and put away tools.

episodes.name: Attach Fabric
episodes.description: The person cuts and prepares the fabric, applies glue and smooths it, then secures the fabric to the furniture with nails using a hammer, trims excess, and returns tools.

860980fb-f992-4bb1-8a46-b644f58090e2.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble paper-based components by positioning a metal board, folding and arranging paper, attaching cardboard, and applying glue.

episodes.name: Prepare and Glue
episodes.description: The person sequentially picks up and positions a metal board, folds and arranges paper, attaches and presses cardboard onto the paper, and dips a brush to apply glue to secure components.

15d4a2c1-1cb8-4b76-a66a-adb20b7e96cb.overall_goal: Inspect a card on the table through a sequence of touches/taps and repeated pick-up, check, and put-down actions.

episodes.name: Initial touches
episodes.description: The person repeatedly touches and taps the card while it lies on the table using their hand.

5533ab65-7463-47a6-b040-c0c6d65b8cf5.overall_goal: Perform maintenance and reassembly of a motorcycle wheel and related components (prepare parts, fasten arm and pipe, and secure wheel nuts).

episodes.name: Prepare wheel & tag
episodes.description: The person folds a tag and then adjusts and rotates the tyre/wheel to prepare it for subsequent work.

5293587a-e6c4-4760-8277-cf284588aac3.overall_goal: Wash, dry, and put away dishes and utensils.

episodes.name: Initial Washing
episodes.description: The person rinses, scrubs, and washes utensils and dishes at the sink, then places cleaned items onto the drying rack.

episodes.name: Final Cleaning & Putaway
episodes.description: The person prepares and applies liquid (soap), cleans remaining items, rinses them, and then places dishes and utensils into storage (shelves and a drawer).

ab5f1a57-29b3-4c07-bc82-bed0b1c3d42f.overall_goal: Clean, rinse, and dry a bowl and a mug (wash them at the sink, then dry and return them to the table).

episodes.name: Wash bowl at sink
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, holds the bowl and washes and rinses it, then closes the tap.

d4fc1fd7-c725-454e-9d2b-0fbc774e81d6.overall_goal: Prepare tools/materials and assemble a bolt onto the engine, then clean and finish the assembly.

episodes.name: Prepare brush and wrench
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush and a container, dips the brush into the container, puts the container down, and then picks up a wrench.

episodes.name: Bolt assembly and finishing
episodes.description: The person places and holds a bolt on the engine, tightens it using a wrench, returns the wrench, uses a tissue to clean, re-picks the bolt, applies glue with a brush, puts tools down, picks up a ring, and moves toward the machine.

efa59c4e-71de-4184-9c82-f78efd4d4702.overall_goal: Assemble a bicycle by attaching pedals, installing brakes and cables, placing the frame on the workbench, and mounting and securing the wheels.

episodes.name: Install Pedal
episodes.description: The person picks up a pedal, attaches it to the bicycle frame, and tightens the bolt using a wrench.

a5a0a366-8721-413f-8412-66cf69b23b18.overall_goal: Clean used dishes and utensils and return them to their storage (cupboard and drawer).

episodes.name: Store cloth
episodes.description: Person opens the cupboard, places a cloth inside, and closes the cupboard.

2ae97f2a-b16d-467b-b73a-721cb00996f1.overall_goal: Prepare dough, shape and cut it into pieces, place the pieces into a pan, and brush them with oil.

episodes.name: Prepare and assemble dough
episodes.description: The person mixes and works the dough, rolls and cuts it into pieces, places the pieces into a pan, and finishes by applying oil with a brush.

3ea57fa2-fd76-48c1-923e-e90b14373c7e.overall_goal: Prepare dough from ingredients and shape it into portions by mixing, kneading, rolling and cutting, then arrange pieces in a pan for baking.

episodes.name: Add Flour
episodes.description: The person picks up flour from a shelf, carries and pours it into the mixer, then places the container on the table.

episodes.name: Make and Shape Dough
episodes.description: The person adds remaining ingredients (sugar, water), operates the mixer, takes out and kneads the dough (with repeated adjustments), prepares a pan, rolls and cuts the dough with a knife, and places tools/items on the table.

203ee455-6f60-4e08-bd89-28e2ca3927da.overall_goal: Prepare and bake dough (mix ingredients, form dough, place on tray, and handle oven placement)

episodes.name: Prepare & Form Dough
episodes.description: The person preheats/uses the oven, prepares and mixes dry ingredients in a bowl, forms dough, and places dough on a tray.

episodes.name: Release Bowl
episodes.description: The person releases the bowl from their other hand, freeing the hand after mixing/handling.

8be918b2-c819-4a84-98dc-5fe24835a4ac.overall_goal: Paint a door while protecting the workspace and handling the paint (open, use, then close and put away).

episodes.name: Initial painting
episodes.description: The person dips the brush and paints the door-frame while holding the frame steady.

episodes.name: Protective setup
episodes.description: The person releases the door, picks up and spreads plastic-wrap on the floor, and places the paint-can onto the protective sheet.

episodes.name: Open, use & store paint
episodes.description: The person removes the lid from the paint-can, handles the paintbrush (dips it), repositions protective material, and then replaces and secures the lid and returns the can.

44ae604b-2e16-497d-a018-03495d8d5654.overall_goal: Wash and clean a car (including the windshield) using a bucket, hose, sponge, towel, and wipers.

episodes.name: Car washing process
episodes.description: The person prepares supplies, rinses and washes the car and windshield with a hose and sponge, manipulates the wipers, and then dries the car using a towel, repeatedly handling the bucket and hose as needed.

a0d6bd8e-c477-442b-bab3-731775b44b43.overall_goal: Wash the car by preparing water, spraying, and scrubbing it.

episodes.name: Prepare water & rinse
episodes.description: The person prepares cleaning supplies and water (open tap, fill bucket), sprays the car with the hose and positions/sets down items.

episodes.name: Scrub the car
episodes.description: The person raises the wiper, uses the sponge to wash and move across the car surface (including dipping sponge and flipping it), and temporarily releases/holds the car as needed.

episodes.name: Finish wiper
episodes.description: The person lowers the wiper to complete the task.

3c80ddb5-5046-4d97-9162-5e5a87ccb2fd.overall_goal: Retrieve and organize tools, then use them to loosen/remove and retighten a bolt on the car, and finally store the tools.

episodes.name: Open toolbox & pick
episodes.description: The person opens the toolbox and picks up a wrench from it with hand1.

episodes.name: Gather tools & position
episodes.description: The person handles a bolt, moves the toolbox to the car/workbench area, opens a cabinet, and retrieves additional tools (wrench, screwdriver) from the cabinet.

episodes.name: Pack tools into toolbox
episodes.description: The person places the wrench and screwdriver into the toolbox using their hands.

episodes.name: Store toolbox & repair bolt
episodes.description: The person closes the cabinet, puts down and closes tools, stores the toolbox in the cabinet, then uses a wrench to loosen and remove a bolt from the car, places the bolt on the workbench, picks up a bolt from the toolbox, holds it on the car, and tightens it back using the wrench.

05c937ff-816b-46b8-8ae2-864eae85e987.overall_goal: Prepare and smooth (sand) a stand using sandpaper on a table.

episodes.name: Position and Remove
episodes.description: The person holds, rotates, and aligns the stand, then removes an item from the stand using both hands.

episodes.name: Inspect and Sand
episodes.description: The person inspects and holds the stand, picks up sandpaper, smoothens the stand with the sandpaper, places the sandpaper on the table, and adjusts the stand.

4f68183f-610a-44de-b102-e7f300b49dcd.overall_goal: Prepare dough by mixing ingredients, kneading the dough, and adding dry and wet ingredients into the bowl.

episodes.name: Prepare & Mix
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, covers the bowl, and mixes ingredients in the bowl.

3c18ec5c-7e6b-400d-9260-70598e04a373.overall_goal: Potting a plant: placing a plant into a pot, adding soil with a trowel, and tidying up.

episodes.name: Position Pot
episodes.description: The person picks up the pot and places it on the table to prepare the workspace.

episodes.name: Planting & Soil Work
episodes.description: The person places and adjusts the plant in the pot, uses soil (from a bag) added and scooped with a trowel, closes and stores the bag, cleans the area, and finishes by adding soil around the plant.

d851b431-8551-492b-8332-bd46c3bfdaba.overall_goal: Potting a plant: placing the plant into a planter and adding soil using a trowel and a bag of soil.

episodes.name: Place and Fill Start
episodes.description: The person places and adjusts the plant in the planter, then uses a trowel and a bag of soil to scoop and pour soil around the plant before putting the trowel down.

episodes.name: Soil Transfer Loop
episodes.description: The person (while holding the bag) repeatedly dips the trowel into the bag, scoops soil, removes it, and pours it into the planter, then releases the bag from the hand.

episodes.name: Tool Return & Finish
episodes.description: The person puts down the trowel, picks it up again to repeat scooping from the bag, then releases the bag and ends holding the planter.

dabf199a-bf55-440d-8aeb-77ead18097ae.overall_goal: Attach fabric to the door and secure fasteners (bolts/nuts) using hand tools

episodes.name: Attach fabric & initial fasten
episodes.description: The person picks up and attaches the fabric to the door, then picks up a screwdriver to hold and adjust a bolt and sets the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Tooled fasten & nut work
episodes.description: The person releases a bolt, picks up tools and nuts, loosens a net, places nuts into a toolbox, and uses wrench/spanner to tighten bolts and nuts, with several put-downs and picks.

1560b9ee-e2da-4dda-a875-52e5bae8d88a.overall_goal: Disassemble a plug connection: loosen nuts with a screwdriver, manipulate and remove the wire, and place components/tools on the table.

episodes.name: Disassemble plug assembly
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and the plug, uses a screwdriver to loosen nuts in the plug, manipulates and removes the wire, and places the plug and tools back on the table.

5bc29170-aa13-4dd7-bb48-2790f676463c.overall_goal: Repair a damaged electrical connection and restore power to the circuit

episodes.name: Expose and Cut Wire
episodes.description: The person picks up a wire from the wall, then uses a knife to cut the wire and sets the knife down.

c4d332b2-7fcc-4993-b9ea-26d6f794984f.overall_goal: Prune leaves with pruning shears and collect the cut leaves into a basket.

episodes.name: Prepare basket
episodes.description: The person picks up and carries a basket and places it on the ground to prepare for collecting leaves.

df0fa70d-600e-477b-aaea-275f86ff7010.overall_goal: Install, secure, and adjust a gauge onto a motorcycle wheel and inspect the assembly

episodes.name: Tool & Gauge Preparation
episodes.description: The person unpacks and gathers tools and parts, tightens screws on the gauge, cleans and inspects it, and collects screws from the carton.

episodes.name: Screw Insertion & Adjustment
episodes.description: The person holds the gauge while inserting and securing a screw, then inspects and adjusts the gauge with pliers and releases it.

episodes.name: Mounting & Final Checks
episodes.description: The person picks up a wrench, mounts and secures the gauge onto the wheel (tightening and tapping as needed), cleans and adjusts the wheel and motorcycle, then moves and inspects the assembly.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.description: Actions: hold, fix, tighten, put-down, pick-up, hit, adjust, release, clean, check, pull, move, examine

32e25924-9d92-4030-a328-11e2c4c7ac56.overall_goal: Prepare and season dough pieces, apply egg wash, and load them into the oven to bake.

episodes.name: Dough preparation
episodes.description: The person picks up and manipulates dough (dipping, twisting, shaping, rolling) and places shaped pieces on the table and tray.

episodes.name: Egg-wash brushing
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush, applies egg wash to the dough pieces, then puts the brush down on the table.

episodes.name: Seasoning and baking
episodes.description: The person sprinkles salt on the dough, picks up the tray, carries and places it into the oven, closes the oven door, and sets the timer.

c1ef9d03-1278-4216-b1e4-b1a298a892d9.overall_goal: Prepare dough by scraping and cutting it into strips, then place the strips into a tray.

episodes.name: Move to table
episodes.description: The person moves to the table to begin the task.

episodes.name: Scrape and place tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a scraper, scrapes dough from the table, handles a tray, carries and places the tray on a rack, then resumes scraping and cutting the dough into strips.

episodes.name: Handle dough strips
episodes.description: The person releases the dough, picks up the produced dough strips with both hands, carries them to a tray, and drops them into the tray.

950f70a4-f90b-4a15-97a0-c14ad6960285.overall_goal: Clean dishes, cookware, and kitchen surfaces (wash, dry, rinse) and put items away.

episodes.name: Prepare & Wash Sieve
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, picks up a sponge and holds a sieve, washes the sieve with the sponge, then puts the sponge down.

episodes.name: Rinse & Dry Sieve
episodes.description: The person rinses the sieve under the tap, turns the tap off, picks up a towel to dry the sieve, and then puts objects down and readies sponge for next wash.

episodes.name: Rinse & Sink Prep
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries a plate, puts it down, then carries pizza tray and stacks of plates from the table to the sink and places them into the sink.

episodes.name: Bring Sieve & Wash Pan
episodes.description: The person picks up a sieve from the counter and places it in the sink, then picks up a sponge, turns on the tap, holds a pan and washes it with the sponge.

episodes.name: Dry & Put Away
episodes.description: The person rinses and dries the pan, then picks up plates, pizza tray, pan, and sieve and places them into the cupboard, wipes the counter with a cloth, and readies the sponge.

episodes.name: Clean Sink
episodes.description: The person washes the sink using a sponge.

episodes.name: Handle Pan & Tray
episodes.description: The person turns off the tap, dries the sink, picks up a pan from the stove and carries it to the sink to wash, then readies sponge and washes the pizza-tray.

episodes.name: Final Rinse & Dry
episodes.description: The person rinses the pizza-tray under the tap, turns off the tap, picks up a towel to dry the tray, and then puts the towel down.

583ff0cb-4697-4f63-b525-bf5bc2318117.overall_goal: Prepare and bake dough into bread (mixing, kneading and rolling), bake and cool the bread, then move a tray and operate the dough machine.

episodes.name: Mixing and Baking
episodes.description: The person measures and sprinkles flour, kneads and prepares the dough, loads it into the oven, starts the bake cycle, and handles baked bread.

episodes.name: Rolling Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses a rolling pin to roll the dough, then places the rolling pin back on the table.

episodes.name: Transport and Operate
episodes.description: The person carries a tray to the dough machine, places the tray on a shelf near the machine, and operates the dough machine.

f35817ce-c97c-4795-b92d-bfd71aa3c7de.overall_goal: Assemble and secure parts (bolts, screws, and a cover) onto a motorbike, then adjust and finalize their placement.

episodes.name: Attach Bolt
episodes.description: Person positions the motorbike, picks a bolt and screwdriver, tightens the bolt onto the motorbike, and sets the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Release Hold
episodes.description: Person releases the motorbike from their hand (hand2).

episodes.name: Loosen Screw
episodes.description: Person picks up the screwdriver, holds the motorbike, and untightens a screw.

episodes.name: Replace Cover & Finalize
episodes.description: Person removes screws, sets tools and screws down, picks up and places a cover onto the motorbike, tightens its screws, fetches bolts from a box, places and tightens them, and finally releases the bike.

fefb0892-7e1a-4a34-9418-ea1c96705edc.overall_goal: Prepare and care for a potted plant (clean the pot, position and adjust the plant, add fertilizer, water it, and trim leaves).

episodes.name: Plant care routine
episodes.description: The person performs a continuous sequence of actions to clean a pot, handle and position a plant, apply fertilizer and water, and finally trim leaves using various tools and hands.

56ddd3b9-5598-4f87-8a90-3f7c810d3e74.overall_goal: Remove a motorbike wheel, service/adjust it, and reattach it to the motorbike.

episodes.name: Remove fasteners
episodes.description: The person picks up tools (wrench, screwdriver, hammer), unscrews bolts and screws on the wheel, taps the wheel as needed, and places the tools on the workbench.

episodes.name: Remove wheel and secure
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel off the motorbike, places it in a vice, uses a wrench to screw in bolts (preparation/temporary fastening), and returns the wrench to the workbench.

episodes.name: Reattach and adjust
episodes.description: The person lifts the wheel from the vice, attaches it onto the motorbike, tightens the bolts with a wrench, places the wrench back, then inspects, adjusts alignment, and checks wheel rotation.

c9a6233c-7a8b-488c-b0ab-bce963c643bd.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a chair by inserting and tightening screws and bolts using hand tools.

episodes.name: Prepare and Tap
episodes.description: The person moves to the carton, picks up tools (spanner and hammer), holds the chair joint with the other hand, taps the joint with the hammer, then puts the hammer down.

episodes.name: Release Joint
episodes.description: The person releases the joint from the supporting hand.

episodes.name: Screw Insertion & Tightening
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver, tightens screws on the chair, puts the screwdriver down, handles individual screws (pick-up and insert), picks the screwdriver again to tighten inserted screws, and then drops the screwdriver on the platform.

episodes.name: Finalize Chair Adjustment
episodes.description: The person releases the chair from the supporting hand, holds and repositions the chair, pulls it as needed, and tightens a bolt on the chair using a spanner.

a61ec2b9-bc21-4e55-ac3f-9f52407633cc.overall_goal: Prepare dough by cutting, rolling and mixing with flour and water, place it into a pan, and bake it in the oven.

episodes.name: Prepare Dough Pieces
episodes.description: The person picks up a scrapper, holds and cuts the dough, then puts the scrapper down.

episodes.name: Knead, Mix & Bake Prep
episodes.description: The person releases and manipulates the dough (rolling and stretching), adds flour and water, mixes ingredients, places the dough into a pan, and prepares the oven (putting in pan, closing, and setting timer).

a1f09ebf-619d-41fd-841d-56629d803003.overall_goal: Prepare cleaning supplies and clean/scrape surfaces (collect debris, scrub and sweep the floor).

episodes.name: Prepare & scrape
episodes.description: The person gathers and organizes supplies (bucket, tape, paper, carpet, glove, scraper), puts on gloves, holds wood and scrapes it, then releases the wood.

episodes.name: Store & clean floor
episodes.description: The person stores/positions items (rod, ladder), picks up cleaning tools (scraper, broom, dustpan), scrubs the floor and then sweeps and collects dust.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, place, hold, scrub, put-down, sweep, collect

26b635ab-134a-477c-a22e-e805eed07a9d.overall_goal: Clean dishes and utensils by soaping and scrubbing them with a sponge, rinsing under the tap, and placing them on a drying rack.

episodes.name: Prepare cleaning tools
episodes.description: The person gets gloves, a sponge, wets the sponge under the tap, applies soap, and temporarily places the soap and sponge on a slab.

8cf5a53b-fa9c-4fe7-b767-697133d4d5b8.overall_goal: Prepare painting materials, apply paint to the book (and position the canvas), then clean and wipe the paintbrush.

episodes.name: Prepare and Paint
episodes.description: The person sets up the canvas and painting tools, dips and mixes paint on a palette, and applies paint to the book with a paintbrush.

episodes.name: Clean Brush
episodes.description: The person puts down the palette, uses a cup of water to dip and swirl the paintbrush, then wipes and puts the brush down.

4988de48-c77e-406d-8367-68fe2266a8aa.overall_goal: Create, refine, and finish a wooden sculpture using hand tools (chisel) and measurement/finishing tools

episodes.name: Initial Carving
episodes.description: The person picks up a chisel and carves the wood, inspects the carved area, then places the chisel down on the workbench.

episodes.name: Tool Adjustment & Fine Shaping
episodes.description: The person adjusts machine components and repeatedly picks up and uses the chisel to adjust and shave the sculpture, wiping and examining the work and placing the chisel on the bench between uses.

episodes.name: Clamping, Measuring & Finishing
episodes.description: The person secures the work with a clamp (turning the handle to fix it), holds and places the wood on the bench, measures and marks it, carves further, then smoothens the surface and brushes off dust.

aa8fcce0-75d1-485f-aede-5d9e6997ad41.overall_goal: Clean and prepare the car interior by removing trash, accessing the car, and cleaning the seat and mat while preparing a wet cloth.

episodes.name: Prepare & Clean Seat
episodes.description: The person removes trash, accesses the car (using a key), and cleans the car seat with a cloth.

episodes.name: Mat Care & Prep Cloth
episodes.description: The person handles and cleans a mat (car mat), moves it into the car, retrieves items from a bag, and wets a cloth by pouring liquid from a bottle.

6cfe67ef-f0cc-47f0-8808-31efcf876095.overall_goal: Assemble and secure a furniture piece by positioning and inserting screws, tightening and adjusting the piece, then inspecting stability and putting tools away.

episodes.name: Prepare fasteners & tool
episodes.description: The person picks up the screwdriver and retrieves screws from the bowl, positioning screws on the furniture piece in preparation for insertion.

41b8254c-ca1e-464c-9323-55301fb5f0e8.overall_goal: Prepare a drink by retrieving ingredients, adding ice and sugar, pouring liquid into a cup, stirring, and tasting.

episodes.name: Retrieve Bottle
episodes.description: The person opens the fridge, takes out a bottle, closes the fridge, and places the bottle on the counter.

episodes.name: Prepare Spoon & Cup
episodes.description: The person opens a drawer to get a spoon, places it on the countertop, interacts with a cup (tastes), rinses the spoon under the tap, stirs the cup, and returns the spoon.

episodes.name: Add Ice
episodes.description: The person opens the freezer, takes out an ice tray, places it on the counter, removes ice cubes from the tray, and adds the ice into the cup.

episodes.name: Add Liquid & Sugar
episodes.description: The person retrieves a bottle from the counter, opens it, pours liquid into the cup, returns the bottle, opens a jar, scoops sugar with a spoon, adds the sugar into the cup, and places the spoon back on the counter.

d04f8465-d11f-40d1-8315-302380ec0af4.overall_goal: Assemble and modify a pen by preparing and attaching a cover, trimming components with a cutter, and inspecting the pen.

episodes.name: Cutting and Attaching Cover
episodes.description: The person picks up a cutter and the cover, cuts or trims the cover, and attaches the cover onto the pen using hands and the cutter, then places tools down.

episodes.name: Cutting and Inspecting Pen
episodes.description: The person holds the pen, uses the cutter to cut or trim the pen, puts the cutter down, and inspects the pen.

577f3941-c9f6-45d3-893e-3fd12cffcad1.overall_goal: Remove rope and debris from a plant and tidy up the workspace

episodes.name: Inspect and Prepare
episodes.description: The person inspects the plant and rope, clears debris, brings and holds the plant while examining and gripping the rope to prepare for removal.

episodes.name: Place Plant Down
episodes.description: The person places the plant down using one hand, setting it in position for rope removal.

episodes.name: Untie and Clean Up
episodes.description: The person unties, loosens, pulls and inspects the rope to remove it from the plant, then places, collects, and stores the rope and wipes hands.

352f1eea-606d-4cd7-906f-733affaf6823.overall_goal: Disassemble a section of fence, collect fasteners and tools, and pack them away.

episodes.name: Remove Fence Board
episodes.description: The person lifts a fence board, carries it, and places it on the ground.

5ec85bbd-e6c4-46e3-8da5-28576730b35f.overall_goal: Set up and organize tableware and move items onto/with a tray for transport or storage.

episodes.name: Tableware setup and transport
episodes.description: The person arranges and adjusts cups, plates, and dishes on the dining table, inspects the arrangement, then repeatedly picks up a tray, carries and places it (including placing cups and plates onto the tray) and moves the tray to different locations.

e8e54409-495b-49e5-b325-556c812d6ff4.overall_goal: Wash, rinse, dry, and place cleaned dishes and utensils (plates, bowls, forks) on a drying rack.

episodes.name: Prepare tools
episodes.description: The person turns on the tap, picks up the sponge and soap, and applies soap to the sponge preparing for washing.

f646012d-baca-46a6-bc03-32047c83f5dc.overall_goal: Clean and service a camera: wipe internal surfaces, attach the cover with a screwdriver, then hold, re-clean and unscrew the cover as needed.

episodes.name: Initial cleaning
episodes.description: The person picks up a wipe and the camera and performs cleaning of the camera interior, then places the wipe and camera back on the table.

episodes.name: Attach cover
episodes.description: The person picks up the cover and a screwdriver, places the cover onto the camera and screws it in, then puts the screwdriver down.

episodes.name: Hold, clean & unscrew
episodes.description: The person holds the camera, cleans it again with a wipe, picks up the screwdriver and unscrews (removes) the cover, then puts the screwdriver down.

831a2da3-bf97-4a79-aa47-16bcdca9e3cd.overall_goal: Load the washing machine with laundry and add detergent

episodes.name: Load laundry and detergent
episodes.description: The person brings a basket of laundry to the washing machine, transfers clothes (including socks and pieces) into the machine, closes the machine, then prepares and pours detergent into the dispenser and closes it.

1db339f1-f887-4e46-86be-2df8eda596db.overall_goal: Refill the car's windshield washer tank using water carried in a bucket

episodes.name: Fetch, Fill, Pour
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up a bucket, walks to a tap, places it under the tap to fill with water, carries the filled bucket to the car, and pours water into the car's washer/container.

303505b9-2cf3-488d-ae5f-d72d3bf73585.overall_goal: Assemble and decorate a cardboard component onto a model train using cloth, glue, trimming, and paint.

episodes.name: Prepare Cardboard Pieces
episodes.description: The person picks up and positions cardboard, cuts and trims excess material, and applies glue to prepare the cardboard for placement.

episodes.name: Attach Cloth Layer
episodes.description: The person picks up cloth, places it onto the glued cardboard, presses it down, and aligns the cardboard on the train.

episodes.name: Glue Re-application
episodes.description: The person picks up a second glue container, applies glue to the cardboard, and puts the glue back down.

episodes.name: Final Press and Paint
episodes.description: The person presses the cardboard onto the train, inspects the crafts, picks up a paintbrush, paints the cardboard on the train, and puts the brush down.

92af2e29-8b4c-4a37-bb48-f3b3e4d1901a.overall_goal: Remove, clean, and return a car floor mat

episodes.name: Open car door
episodes.description: The person opens the car door to access the mat inside the vehicle.

episodes.name: Retrieve and clean mat
episodes.description: The person takes the mat out of the car, carries it to the ground, and performs a sequence of cleaning steps (spray, scrub, rinse, dry, shake, beat, vacuum) before returning and placing the mat back into the car.

e03004cc-80ce-4d82-9d09-f50fc82b6456.overall_goal: Prepare and paint a piece of wood using mixed paint and a paintbrush.

episodes.name: Prepare work surface
episodes.description: The person picks up cardboard and a piece of wood and places them on the workbench/onto the cardboard to set up a workspace.

e08c9103-d6a0-4a43-8276-c8f5e7cfe57f.overall_goal: Mount and secure a grinding wheel on the grinder and prepare the chisel by positioning and filing it.

episodes.name: Insert key & hold
episodes.description: The person picks up a key, inserts it into the grinder's lock and holds the grinder.

episodes.name: Mount & secure wheel
episodes.description: The person positions the chisel, picks up and places the wheel on the grinder, aligns and tightens it with a wrench, then uses the key to operate the grinder's lock/handle.

episodes.name: Hold chisel
episodes.description: The person holds the chisel against the rotating wheel to prepare it for filing.

episodes.name: Turn & file
episodes.description: The person turns the handle and files the chisel using the grinder wheel.

d84b8c76-d6b9-4e27-ae66-b010bce5ed1e.overall_goal: Prepare, iron, check, fold, and put a fabric item away (move it to the table) using an iron and an ironing board.

episodes.name: Position & First Ironing
episodes.description: The person adjusts and places the fabric on the ironing board, picks up the iron and performs an initial ironing pass, then sets the iron down.

episodes.name: Re-check, Iron & Finish
episodes.description: The person releases and repositions the fabric, performs another ironing pass, feels/checks the fabric, then folds it and moves it to the table.

1fdbef9f-8aa7-46b1-8063-d1435577608a.overall_goal: Prepare, press (iron), and fold garments (shirt and shorts).

episodes.name: Prepare and Fold
episodes.description: The person lays out and adjusts garments, stashes the iron briefly, folds the shirt and shorts, and places folded items on a board or storage.

episodes.name: Ironing and Pressing
episodes.description: The person retrieves the iron from storage or table and repeatedly presses and moves it across the garment (shirt/short), lifting and placing the iron between presses while adjusting the garment.

e252c493-e587-403d-bd01-22713a1d5a57.overall_goal: Prepare and finish a shirt: pick up and use the iron to press the shirt, put the iron away, then place and fold the shirt.

episodes.name: Pick up iron
episodes.description: Person picks up the iron from the board using their hand.

episodes.name: Iron the shirt
episodes.description: Person holds and irons the shirt, moves and places the iron (including turning it off and briefly storing it), and continues ironing and placing the iron back on the board.

episodes.name: Place and fold shirt
episodes.description: Person picks up the shirt from the table, carries and places it on the board, adjusts it, picks it up from the board, and folds it.

ea87324e-d129-425f-b247-e6bcc4ff332c.overall_goal: Prepare and treat a wooden piece by painting it, then sanding and wiping it, and finally opening a can (of material).

episodes.name: Paint the wood
episodes.description: The person picks up a paintbrush, dips it into a can, holds the wood, repeatedly paints the wood, then puts down the brush and releases the wood.

episodes.name: Sand and wipe
episodes.description: The person picks up sandpaper to sand the wood while holding it, puts the sandpaper down, then picks up a cloth to wipe the wood and puts the cloth down, finally releasing the wood.

episodes.name: Open the can
episodes.description: The person picks up a screwdriver and a can (with the other hand) and uses the screwdriver to open the can.

7da432dc-690a-49da-8f44-312c84494c75.overall_goal: Paint a rail with a paintbrush, then clean and store the brush and paint supplies.

episodes.name: Paint the rail
episodes.description: The person repeatedly applies paint to the rail using a paintbrush, dipping the brush into paint as needed and moving it along the rail; near the end they pick up and handle the paint can and brush.

episodes.name: Re-dip brush
episodes.description: The person re-dips the paintbrush into paint and lifts it out to continue painting.

episodes.name: Stow and clean brush
episodes.description: The person places and picks up the paint can and brush, closes the can, then dips the brush into a water bucket to clean it, takes it out, and shakes off water.

episodes.name: Dry and store brush
episodes.description: The person holds a cloth on the workbench, wipes water off the paintbrush with the cloth, and places the cleaned brush on the workbench.

e8cf9894-0cc7-4480-b490-885308bfb513.overall_goal: Prepare dough pieces (shape and cut), arrange them on a tray, apply egg wash, and load them into the oven for baking.

episodes.name: Prepare & Shape Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and shapes dough pieces, places them on a tray, manages dough and workspace (cleans), opens the oven and prepares the tray, then readies a cutter and cuts the dough.

episodes.name: Release Dough
episodes.description: The person releases the dough from their hand, freeing the dough after manipulation.

episodes.name: Load Oven & Prep Brush
episodes.description: The person opens the oven, picks up the tray and places it into the oven, closes and sets the timer, then picks up a brush and dips it into egg.

episodes.name: Egg Wash Application
episodes.description: The person holds the tray and applies egg to the dough pieces with a brush, then puts the brush down.

e43f5b38-213a-4d42-afaa-32c3b77f4da6.overall_goal: Prepare dough, top it with sauce, and bake (make and assemble a sauced baked item).

episodes.name: Prepare and Shape Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and arranges dough and tools, sprinkles flour, rolls the dough flat, and releases/sets the dough down.

episodes.name: Bake Tray & Make Sauce
episodes.description: The person prepares the tray, places it into the oven to bake, and separately retrieves ingredients and utensils to scoop, season, and pour sauce/spices onto the dough.

episodes.name: Spread Sauce
episodes.description: The person uses a spoon to spread sauce evenly onto the dough (multiple spreading actions).

c7cc9fbf-e47a-4bc7-9f08-7ff6954a787a.overall_goal: Prepare dough from flour and water, then process it using a machine

episodes.name: Prepare and Process Dough
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens the flour bag, measures and pours flour and water into a bowl, mixes and kneads the ingredients into dough, transfers the dough into a machine, operates the machine, and uses a scoop to add additional flour into the bowl as needed.

3121a918-44a3-446a-b809-95e1b5766cb0.overall_goal: Clean and store kitchenware (wash, rinse, dry, and organize dishes, cups, bowls, and utensils)

episodes.name: Store Tray
episodes.description: The person picks up a tray, carries it to the cupboard, places it inside, and closes the cupboard.

312da1d0-9e56-4f5e-bb12-9cb67e8bc674.overall_goal: Set up, fuel, and operate a generator, then use the hose to water plants.

episodes.name: Generator setup
episodes.description: The person inspects and prepares the generator and its tank, manipulates lids and controls, and connects and adjusts a hose.

episodes.name: Fueling and watering
episodes.description: The person connects wiring, inspects and wipes hands, prepares and pours fuel into the generator, then uses the hose to turn toward and spray the plants before turning off the water.

1f757b4c-032e-4012-a0f9-bb7c1a437612.overall_goal: Attach and secure a wire around a hose (using hands and pliers) and verify the connection is tight.

episodes.name: Wrap and Tie Wire
episodes.description: The person retrieves the hose and wire, wraps the wire around the hose, ties and tightens it (using hands and pliers), then places the wire and pliers on the workbench.

episodes.name: Check and Secure
episodes.description: The person picks up the hose and wire again, places the wire, checks and adjusts the wire's tightness, and secures the connection.

4fcddb9e-38ad-4948-acf6-dd76e87f7eb3.overall_goal: Attach, secure, clean, and inspect a bicycle wheel onto the bike using hand tools.

episodes.name: Wheel attachment & checks
episodes.description: The person gathers tools, installs and secures the bicycle wheel to the bike, performs alignment and movement checks, cleans off grease, and returns tools.

39865b55-0b68-4cf9-a9fa-d55cfbc5909b.overall_goal: Assemble, inspect, and secure engine components by installing covers, checking alignment, and fastening/tightening fasteners.

episodes.name: Inspect & Install Cover
episodes.description: The person inspects the engine, installs the cover and associated fasteners, checks alignment, and tightens loose bolts using hand tools.

episodes.name: Remove & Final Tighten
episodes.description: The person removes a component from a nut, then picks up tools and tightens screws/metal on the engine, with intermittent put-downs.

4ad40842-5cee-49c2-a382-211fd7a4872b.overall_goal: Remove baked bread from the oven, transfer and arrange the bread into a basket, clean crumbs, and return the tray to the oven.

episodes.name: Remove and Transfer
episodes.description: The person takes a tray from the oven, scoops bread using a paddle, and transfers the bread into a basket, then places the paddle and other items on the table.

episodes.name: Clean and Return
episodes.description: The person picks up a brush to brush off crumbs from the table, places the brush down, picks up the tray and spatula, returns the tray to the oven, closes it, and arranges the bread and spatula on the table.

72d27890-983d-48f8-8eed-7ca937424ca2.overall_goal: Tie a rope to a plant, loosen and pull the plant out of the ground, then untie and coil the rope and remove an associated weed.

episodes.name: Secure and Prep Plant
episodes.description: The person picks up a rope, ties it around the plant, tightens and holds it while pulling and loosening soil around the plant to prepare for removal.

episodes.name: Remove and Store Rope
episodes.description: The person releases and pulls the plant out of the ground, places it, unties and coils the rope, stores the rope in a toolbox, and finally grips and uproots a weed.

a814274f-898a-4bc4-ad93-f764844bf03c.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble a wooden piece by cutting, measuring, drilling, marking, inserting and tightening a screw, then position and finish by placing the wood and removing tape.

episodes.name: Prepare & Assemble
episodes.description: The person picks up and uses tools to cut, inspect, drill, measure, mark, insert a screw and tighten it on the wood, returning tools when finished.

episodes.name: Position & Finish
episodes.description: The person releases and picks up the wood, places it on the workbench, holds it while removing tape, and puts the tape down.

82dc7a9e-a0a4-4611-8e49-960d6c77b326.overall_goal: Refurbish and secure a railing by painting, fastening hardware, cleaning, and then wiping and inspecting the finished railing.

episodes.name: Paint and Repair
episodes.description: The person paints the railing, repositions a chair, tightens a bolt with a screwdriver, then switches to a brush to clean dust from the railing.

episodes.name: Wipe and Inspect
episodes.description: The person picks up a cloth, wipes the railing with the cloth, and inspects the railing.

7070897e-556f-421a-b662-551fe2ab7fb5.overall_goal: Clean the container, close its lid, and secure the lid with tape.

episodes.name: Prepare and Close
episodes.description: The person picks up the lid, container and cloth, wipes the container, positions and secures the lid, then prepares tape and scissors and cuts a piece of tape.

episodes.name: Tape and Finish
episodes.description: The person places tape and scissors on the table, applies tape around the edge of the lid, smooths the tape, and checks the attached tape.

3619f6fe-9722-4e98-ac1a-372821f1ec78.overall_goal: Organize and stow personal belongings into the car (trunk, cabin, and glove compartment).

episodes.name: Load trunk
episodes.description: Open the trunk, pick up a bag, and place the bag into the trunk.

3db79f36-a611-42f6-bfb7-76cf7720a00a.overall_goal: Sew a piece of fabric and finish it by trimming excess thread, inspecting, adjusting and smoothing the final work.

episodes.name: Threading and Sewing
episodes.description: The person picks up a needle and thread, sews the fabricpulling and tightening the threadand puts the needle and thread onto the workbench.

episodes.name: Trimming and Finishing
episodes.description: The person picks up scissors to cut and trim thread, places and holds materials on the workbench, passes thread through the needle, inspects and adjusts the sewn fabric, then smoothens the final piece.

39653b45-9792-4ef2-bc6b-945431870ce3.overall_goal: Create a piece of knitted fabric from yarn using knitting needles

episodes.name: Set up stitches
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and a knitting needle, inserts and wraps the yarn to create loops and prepares the initial stitches on the needle.

episodes.name: Finish and knit
episodes.description: The person releases and cuts the yarn end, uses scissors, inspects the completed fabric, and performs repeated knitting, pulling, tightening, and checking actions to continue and finish the fabric.

0da6e15a-d33b-4a61-bfce-1fb28d893637.overall_goal: Use a crochet hook and yarn to crochet stitches, managing tension and securing stitches to create a crocheted fabric.

episodes.name: Setup and First Stitches
episodes.description: The person picks up yarn and the crochet hook, checks and adjusts yarn tension, forms a loop and pulls yarn through to create and tighten initial stitches.

episodes.name: Crocheting and Securing
episodes.description: The person continues crocheting by wrapping yarn around the hook, pulling yarn through loops to form stitches, placing and picking up the hook as needed, and tightening or loosening stitches to manage tension.

episodes.name: Episode 0
episodes.description: Actions: hold

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, clean, put-down, put-away

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, put, untangle, stretch, release, hold, arrange, roll, carry, place, adjust

49374bc5-0999-49dc-88bd-c42c0d54365f.overall_goal: Clean the car by washing away soap and water, then drying it.

episodes.name: Initial spot wipe
episodes.description: Person picks up a rag and wipes remaining spots on the car, then puts the rag down.

9f9f42f0-b9fc-4247-8dad-3ef0ff36e402.overall_goal: Clean and finish a piece of wood by brushing off debris, applying oil, sanding, and wiping.

episodes.name: Pick up brush
episodes.description: The person picks up the brush with their hand to begin working.

episodes.name: Brush and clear
episodes.description: The person holds the wood and uses the brush (and hands) to clean the wood and a leaf, repeatedly picking up and putting down the brush.

episodes.name: Release leaf
episodes.description: The person releases the leaf using their hand, letting it go.

episodes.name: Oil, sand, wipe
episodes.description: The person applies oil to the wood, sands the surface with sandpaper, and then wipes it with a cloth, picking up and putting down tools as needed.

6f082d5d-5f31-4358-b2dc-16d320312ab3.overall_goal: Prepare, cook, and plate dough strips (knead and shape dough, cook the strips, then clean up and put away tools).

episodes.name: Prepare and Cook
episodes.description: The person prepares dough (kneading and rolling), transfers it to a pan, cooks and flips dough strips, plates the cooked strips, sprinkles flour, cleans the table, and puts away some tools.

episodes.name: Cut and Tidy
episodes.description: The person cuts or separates dough strips with a cutter/scraper, places tools on the table, and handles the scraper.

6287465a-ef00-49db-b730-1e1c22e77790.overall_goal: Clean the floor by sweeping debris into a dustpan and emptying it into a bin.

episodes.name: Handle tools
episodes.description: The person picks up and repositions the broom and dustpan, including placing them into storage and preparing the dustpan for use.

1695475c-e527-43e6-b70e-69fd33023148.overall_goal: Prepare and assemble an electrical cable connection by handling and cutting wires, fastening components with tools, insulating the connection, and inserting the cable into the socket.

episodes.name: Prepare and Secure Wiring
episodes.description: The person picks up tools and wires, routes and secures the wire into the socket area, tightens fasteners, insulates the connection, and cuts/places tools back down.

episodes.name: Final Cable Insertion
episodes.description: The person picks up the cable and socket (with different hands) and inserts the cable into the socket to complete the connection.

d6de6eee-b844-49c9-81d4-325fb9697ef6.overall_goal: Prepare nut-filled cracker sandwiches (assemble crackers with peeled nuts and press them onto a plate).

episodes.name: Arrange crackers
episodes.description: The person arranges crackers on a plate using both hands to set up the workspace.

e435eea1-e4f7-4eef-970e-227152032a08.overall_goal: Prepare and handle a keg: fill and rinse it, then move and manage the keg and its lid (store, secure, and remove).

episodes.name: Fill and Rinse
episodes.description: The person picks up a cup, fills and pours water into the keg, operates the faucet and hose, and rinses the inside and outside of the keg before closing and releasing the faucet.

episodes.name: Move and Lid Ops
episodes.description: The person handles the hose, moves the keg (carries and places it on a shelf or ground, transports it to the faucet), then picks up the lid to place, tighten, unscrew, and remove it from the keg.

aa2975d0-9339-4ebf-8f3a-bbdf91bf82ed.overall_goal: Collect soil, mix it into a soil mixture in a container, and then close and shake the container.

episodes.name: Prepare tools & grip
episodes.description: The person picks up a trowel and holds a container to begin the collection process.

episodes.name: Collect and mix soil
episodes.description: The person collects soil (using a trowel and hands), pours it into the container, stirs to mix, then sets tools and container aside and removes the lid.

episodes.name: Inspect and seal
episodes.description: The person holds and inspects the soil mixture, places the lid, closes the container, and shakes it to finish.

fdb68b7b-f09f-4a71-a85c-b02e728e9566.overall_goal: Repair and disassemble a bicycle wheel assembly (mount, patch, tighten, then later loosen and remove wheel and tire).

episodes.name: Install wheel components
episodes.description: The person brings the bicycle to the workbench, attaches a wheel and bolt, applies glue to a tire patch, and puts the glue back on the workbench.

episodes.name: Patch and fit tire
episodes.description: The person releases and patches the tire with a piece of cloth, fits the patched tire onto the wheel using a screwdriver, and readies tools on the workbench while tightening a bolt with a wrench.

episodes.name: Loosen and remove wheel parts
episodes.description: The person fetches a wrench from the toolbox, loosens and removes bolts, removes the wheel from the bicycle and places the wheel on the workbench, using screwdriver and wrench as needed.

episodes.name: Final removal
episodes.description: The person releases the wheel, holds the tire, and removes the tire from the wheel using both hands.

19ed57bf-e23d-425b-a396-30daa1d5e750.overall_goal: Perform maintenance on a motorcycle/scooter, including removing and fitting a tyre, inspecting and cleaning, and tightening/loosening fasteners with hand tools.

episodes.name: Tyre removal & fit
episodes.description: The person removes the tyre from the motorcycle, places it, then picks it up again and fits it back onto the motorcycle.

episodes.name: Scooter check
episodes.description: The person inspects the scooter to check for the presence of a screw.

episodes.name: Tighten with tools
episodes.description: The person picks up a spanner and wrench to tighten screws and bolts on the scooter and motorcycle, then puts the tools down on the workbench.

episodes.name: Inspect, clean & unscrew
episodes.description: The person inspects the motorcycle, wipes off grease with a cloth, handles tools (wrench, spanner, screwdriver) to unscrew and remove screws/bolts from motorcycle and scooter, and places removed parts and tools on the workbench.

d4346ac0-ef62-405b-9086-4ee0085af9ab.overall_goal: Fix and secure a ceiling holder using a screwdriver, using a ladder to reach the ceiling and storing the tool when not in use.

episodes.name: Prepare & Fix Holder
episodes.description: The person takes out a screwdriver and a holder, holds the holder against the ceiling, fixes it with the screwdriver, and then releases the holder.

episodes.name: Ladder Handling & Positioning
episodes.description: The person handles the ladderputting it down, picking it up, carrying and moving it, placing it, climbing up and downand intermittently retrieves and stows the screwdriver and holder while working.

episodes.name: Stow Screwdriver
episodes.description: The person puts the screwdriver into their pocket.

c9f5958f-ea3f-452e-913d-4f6ede7decea.overall_goal: Prune and remove vines, then secure and tidy the plants

episodes.name: Tool preparation
episodes.description: The person retrieves a pruner and a rope from their gear and briefly handles the pruner before placing it into the pack.

episodes.name: Prune and clear
episodes.description: The person holds and cuts vines and plants using hands and a pruner, pulls out and disposes vine material to a bin, and uses rope to tie and secure plants.

f643d88a-92cc-456d-bed7-c010275637e8.overall_goal: Perform garden maintenance by removing weeds and vines, collecting debris, and watering plants

episodes.name: Garden maintenance
episodes.description: The person removes weeds and vines, uses shears and a rake to cut and collect debris, waters the plant, and stores the tools.

99158929-5e0b-4fa5-948c-9791c25cf0ac.overall_goal: Retrieve pages from a booklet and organize the papers on the table.

episodes.name: Pick & Arrange Papers
episodes.description: The person repeatedly picks up, adjusts, and places papers on the table, then arranges them using both hands.

f0beca54-3ef3-4c5f-a3e3-c10478e624b5.overall_goal: Remove, inspect, and reattach a bicycle pedalusing tools to remove a nut, inspect the pedal, and tighten it back onto the bicycle.

episodes.name: Inspect & Approach
episodes.description: The person tests and moves the pedal, then moves toward the bicycle to begin work.

episodes.name: Remove, Service, Reattach
episodes.description: The person picks up tools, removes the pedal and nut, inspects components, and reattaches and tightens the nut/pedal onto the bicycle.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.description: Actions: pick-up, hold, loosen, remove, put-down, move, position, tighten, place, inspect, attach

1cddd647-6aaf-49ed-b09d-922d729453a8.overall_goal: Organize and sort books by picking them up from a heap or table, inspecting them, and placing them either on a bookshelf or on a table.

episodes.name: Pick and Shelf 1
episodes.description: The person picks a book from a heap, examines it, then places it on a bookshelf.

d19faa97-b823-4c1d-b00b-e9839f1a2391.overall_goal: Read and mark a book, then prepare and tune a guitar and place the book on a stand for use.

episodes.name: Book inspection
episodes.description: The person picks up and opens a book, flips pages to mark and read from it.

episodes.name: Guitar setup & placement
episodes.description: The person picks up and releases the guitar, adjusts and tightens strings, tests and holds the instrument, then places a book on a stand and makes final adjustments.
